mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET user_state = 'F', host_state = 'F' WHERE user_state = 'D' AND host_state = 'D' AND no = #{no} AND sysdate - CAST(end_day as DATE) > (SELECT check_out/24 FROM bookings b, pooms p WHERE b.poom_no = p.no AND b.no = #{no})
mapper.select: SELECT no, userNo, poomNo, startDay, endDay, petCnt, userState, hostState, mainAddress, subAddress, price, speciesName, poomType, img,poomTitle, r as "rowNum" FROM (SELECT no, userNo, poomNo, startDay, endDay, petCnt, userState, hostState, mainAddress, subAddress, price, speciesName, poomType, img,poomTitle, rownum r FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.user_no userNo, b.poom_no poomNo, b.start_day startDay, b.end_day endDay, b.pet_cnt petCnt, b.user_state userState, b.host_state hostState, p.main_address mainAddress, p.sub_address subAddress, p.price price, s.name speciesName, p.type poomType, pt.img img, p.title poomTitle FROM bookings b, pooms p, species s, photos pt WHERE b.poom_no = p.no AND p.species_no = s.no AND p.no = pt.content_no AND pt.type = 'M' AND b.user_no = #{no} ORDER BY b.no DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT b.no no, total.total total, img.img img, web.web web, (b.end_day-b.start_day) night, po.price price, po.title title, b.start_day as "start", b.end_day as "end", EXTRACT(year from end_day) year, po.check_in checkIn, po.check_out checkOut, s.name speciesName, b.pet_cnt petCnt, b.request request, po.main_address main, po.sub_address sub, po.introduce introduce, u.no userNo, u.name userName, ba.name bank, c.num creditNum, ((b.end_day-b.start_day) * po.price * b.pet_cnt) nightPrice FROM bookings b, (SELECT no, price total, booking_no bookingNo FROM payments p WHERE type = 'H' AND p.booking_no = #{bookingNo}) total, (SELECT ph.img img, b.no bookingNo FROM photos ph, pooms po, bookings b WHERE po.no = ph.content_no AND ph.type = 'M' AND b.no = #{bookingNo} AND b.poom_no = po.no) img, (SELECT no, price web, booking_no bookingNo FROM payments p WHERE type = 'W' AND p.booking_no = #{bookingNo}) web, pooms po, species s, users u, credits c, banks ba WHERE b.no = total.bookingNo AND b.no = img.bookingNo AND b.no = web.bookingNo AND b.no = #{bookingNo} AND po.no = b.poom_no AND s.no = po.species_no AND u.no = b.user_no AND c.user_no = u.no AND c.bank_no = ba.no
